scripts.pretest: jsrevival -p "describe, it" -o "ass: false, bitwise: false, browser: false, closure: false, continue: true, couch: false, debug: false, devel: false, eqeq: false, es5: true, evil: false, forin: false, indent: 10, maxerr: 1000, maxlen: 1024, newcap: false, node: true, nomen: true, passfail: false, plusplus: true, properties: false, regexp: false, rhino: false, unparam: false, sloppy: true, stupid: false, sub: false, todo: true, vars: false, white: true" -r cli-hide-valid -R lib/ test/
